SEO_DESC_COLLECTIONS_EXPLORE: An NFT collection is an assortment of digital assets released by an artist (or group of artists) containing a limited number of individual NFTs. Typically, most NFT collections consist of numerous NFTs that all conform to the same artistic style, with slight variations across each individual token.
SEO_DESC_CREATE: In this page, you can upload file, fill out forms to mint NFTs
SEO_DESC_EDIT: This page is for collection's owner edit collection profile
SEO_TITLE_HOME: Matrix Market - The first all-in-one marketplace
SEO_DESC_HOME: The first all-in-one marketplace for creators, collectors, and traders on Flow. In this page, you can view top/hot collections/nfts, check rankings, explore items...
SEO_DESC_RESULT: This page show the search result of {{query}}
SEO_DESC_FLOWNIA: Flownia, the host of Matrix Market, is a virtual idol who will represent our project and be of service to our community.
SEO_DESC_GENSIS_PEOPLE: An NFT collection jointly undertaken by 8 sculptors, Genesis People is based on the artistsâ€™ reflection on metaverse.
SEO_DEFAULT_DESC: The first all-in-one marketplace for creators, collectors, and traders on Flow
SEO_DESC_FLOWVERSE: Flowverse Socks are the original, official Flowverse NFT. Each of the 111 Sock NFTs unlocks membership to Sock Club. Sock Club membership has additional benefits. Previously, this has included upgrades in partnering Flow Blockchain NFT mints, allow list access to projects, airdrops and project voting.
